Articles.Content:
if i do this will it display the image

https://imgur.com/a/0rSy4BQ.jpeg

Edited June 23, 2021 by kerbalk

The link you have there looks like a link to an imgur album, not an individual image from that album- you should be able to hover over an image to get a ‘copy link’ button, click that and you’ve got the link for that image. Once you have that, use the “insert image from URL” button to the bottom right of the text box you’re typing in; you need to tweak it a bit by adding i. in front of imgur and .png or .jpeg at the end, like so:

For example, the first image in your album has the ID of 5C37avQ and the link Imgur gives you is https://imgur.com/5CE7avQ, so you’d need to change it to https://i.imgur.com/5CE7avQ.png or https://i.imgur.com/5CE7avQ.jpeg (apologies for the dodgy hyperlinks, it’s not easy to edit this stuff on a tablet!) and it will insert the image into your post.

As a .png;

As .jpg:

@kerbalk, your issue has been moved from technical support as it is not an problem with the game itself.

You can also click on the image in imgur, you should see a list of link options on the right, copy and paste the direct link and it should embed.

Edited June 24, 2021 by James Kerman
Moved thread
Of the Imgur alternatives, the BBCode version works best. Just copy it straight into your post.
